Cause of Death: Poisoned by phosphine gas created by mixing red phosphorus with hot water. ("Pilot")
Strangled to death with a bicycle lock. ("...and the Bag's in the River")
Beaten to death with bare fists. ("A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal")
Accidentally crushed his arm by a settling car in a junkyard, which partially severed his arm causing him to bleed to death. ("Seven Thirty-Seven")

Stabbed during the theft of an ATM. ("Peekaboo")
Head crushed with an ATM. ("Peekaboo")
Decapitated. ("Negro y Azul")
Blown up with bomb on tortoise. ("Negro y Azul")
Shot several times in the abdomen and in the back. ("Mandala")

Cause of Death: Asphyxiated on her own vomit while on heroin. Walt chose not to save her. ("Phoenix")

Dead: 167 unnamed passengers on the Wayfarer 515 and JM 21 flights
Cause of Death: The flights had a mid-air collision after they were given poor air traffic coordinates by Donald Margolis who was suffering emotional strain after the death of his daughter. ("ABQ")
Responsible Party: Donald Margolis by extension of Walter White's actions

Shot in the back while running away, then in the head to kill him. ("No Más")
